text: The Senedd, the unicameral parliament of Wales, has 40 single-member constituencies () and five multi-member electoral regions (). The boundaries and names of the 40 constituencies are the same as those in the House of Commons in the Westminster Parliament. ==Constituencies== ===Current constituencies=== Constituency (Welsh name)
